title: Tim Cook likens wait for Apple Car to Christmas Eve | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Apple Car27]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * The comments are the boss’s latest acknowledgement of Apple’s interest in theauto sector.In a Q&A with Fortune last week Cook said [Apple’s mass hiring of autoexperts](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/tim-cook-on-apple-car-hiring-experts-doesn-t-mean-we-re-committed), doesn’t necessarily mean the company isgoing to offer a car for sale.Cook said: “We don’t have to spend large amounts to explore. So I can’t talkabout this certain area that you’re talking about. But when we start spendinglarge amounts of money, we’re committed at that point. But we explore thingswith teams of people.”(apester:56671355b8db3ddc5ef5c366)Are you looking forward to the Apple car? Let us know in the comments.
